drink_preparation_robot.setting: Robot can only touch objects within the range of gripper contact. The robot has two grippers and thus the robot can hold two objects at most simultaneously.

table.setting: The table is big enough to hold a lot of things

cabinet.setting: This cabinet has a manual door opening cabinet. Objects can be retrieved from the cabinet when the door of the cabinet is in open state.

straw.setting: The straw can be inserted into the glass.

refrigerator.setting: This refrigerator has a manual door opening refrigerator. Objects can be retrieved from the refrigerator when the door of the refrigerator is in open state.

state_description.type: the type of the robot or object, e.g., robot, cube, table, etc.
state_description.position: the 3D position of the robot or object, e.g., [4.0, 6.0, -2.0]
state_description.size: the size of the robot or object, e.g., size of an apple is 0.1
state_description.setting: the role setting of the robot or object, e.g., 'Robot can only touch objects within the range of gripper contact.'
state_description.gripper_content: the content in the gripper of the robot. It is a nested list that represent the affiliation relationship of objects. e.g., [], [['bowl']], [['fruit_tray',['apple']]]
state_description.gripper_contact_range: the range of robot gripper contact, e.g., 0.5
state_description.door_state: the state of the door, e.g., 'Open' or 'Closed'
state_description.content: the content in the corresponding object. It is a nested list that represent the affiliation relationship of objects. e.g., [], [['bowl']], [['fruit_tray',['apple']]]
state_description.glass_on_table: whether the glass is on the table, e.g., True or False
state_description.straw_on_table: whether the straw is on the table, e.g., True or False
state_description.pitcher_on_table: whether the pitcher is on the table, e.g., True or False
state_description.ice_cubes_on_table: whether the ice cubes are on the table, e.g., True or False
